description:
Yuzuka is an extremely good girl, but Miton is worried that Yuzuka might not be social enough with other people at school, but Miton realizes one important truth about his relationship with her.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Boku wa, Yuzuka no Shin`yuu ni Naru
I Will Become Yuzuka`s Best Friend
Je vais devenir ton meilleur ami !
僕は, ゆずかの親友になる
